description: The first release of GE-Proton based on Wine 9.0 / Proton 9.0 is here with GE-Proton 9-1 bringing in a lot of fixes for various games and new games added to ULWGL (Unified Linux Wine Game Launcher).
title: GE-Proton 9-1 brings a whole lot of fixes for Linux / Steam Deck gaming

description: Valve has released an update to Proton Experimental to further improve the Windows game compatibility on Steam Deck and Linux PCs. Here's all that's changed for the March 8th update.
title: Proton Experimental fixes up Apex Legends, Epic Games Store, Warlords Battlecry III

description: Another biweekly release of the Windows compatibility layer Wine is here, with Wine 9.4 bringing some new features and a few nice sounding bug fixes.
title: Wine 9.4 brings updated vkd3d, initial OpenGL support in the Wayland driver
